articles.description: Apple's spiritual successor to AirPower could charge three devices at once and eventually introduce true wireless charging.
articles.content:
AirPower may not be as dead as we thought. Years after canceling the product, Apple is reportedly working on a new charger that could charge three devices at the same time. 
According to Mark Gurman… [+2667 chars]
